Date: 2025-03-26 11:47
Subject: Get Started on your Generative AI for Everyone eLearning
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear Hagop,

 

We noticed that you haven’t completed your GEN AI e-Learning yet.
This course is designed to empower you with essential knowledge on Generative AI, helping you stay ahead in an AI-driven world.

 

Now available in both English and Arabic on the AI Central page, this engaging eLearning experience will help you:

 

     Discover the foundations of Generative AI and how it works.

     Explore common applications of Generative AI.

     Understand the impact of Gen AI on business.

     Adopt a framework for responsible AI use.

 

Finish your learning and invite a colleague to join the #GenAIChallenge journey—let’s unlock the power of AI together!

 

Complete the eLearning <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3339&section=1> 

 

 

With you at Heart,

Chalhoub University Team

 



 

www.chalhoubuniversity.com <http://www.chalhoubuniversity.com/> 

 

 

CHALHOUB UNIVERSITY​​​​
